title: Juedui Lingyu Fanwai Pian
synopsis: In order to complete the family trial, Young Xiu came alone to the Polar Academy, which is located in the Holy War of Gods and Demons. The Academy equips every student with academic gloves that can activate the weapon system. Using the gloves, every student can continue to practice and grow. So there is a chance to finally comprehend powerful domain forces such as time and space manipulation, teleportation, etc. However, in this weak and strong academy, they also sneaked into the survivors of the Demon Race, and their figures were ready to move in the dark. And while Xiu was on his way to the peak of this challenge field, he also gradually discovered the untold and shocking secrets of his life experience. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Bajiu Buli 2
synopsis: In a remote mysterious town, there are three friends. They thought they could start the naive mode at this small age. They thought their painting style was a fairy tale. But because the world was too cruel, they were forced to experience a lot of unimaginable The (beep)-like thing. Because the plot is too weird, the posture is not ethical, and it claims to be a "hilarious Tucao drama", even its mother drama "Love Apartment" is already considering whether to distinguish it from it.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaishou Jiazu
synopsis: On Dream Island, a heart-shaped island far away from the human world, a group of monsters live. The life of the monsters is primitive and simple, full of childishness. Three siblings, cute pink, terrible blue, and terrible green, were born in a very ordinary family of five on Mengmeng Island. Pinkie is the little sister of the three siblings. She is born with great strength but simple and kind, with countless beautiful little dreams in her heart. The eldest brother Lan is terrible and mischievous, and the second brother Green is terrible and simple in mind. The brothers always want to become the super monster to prove that they are the best, but they always backfire. They and their partners have fun together every day, and they fight against the big and small strangers who always want to make things worse. The plot revolves around their dreams and troubles in life, presents their growth and life experience, enlightens the hearts of children, and reveals the true meaning of the beautiful words in life such as justice, bravery, kindness, confidence, and love. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaishou Jiazu Fanwai
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Cang Zang Xue Fu Ji
synopsis: The cartoon "Tibetan Studies of Buddhism" tells the story of the little monk in Tibet through ink painting, and tells many Buddhist philosophy in the story.  (translated from tenceng)

title: He Laoshi Anquan Ketang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jiangjiu Ren
synopsis: There are 6 episodes in the first season of "Being Careful of People". In the work, five strange creatures use the little things in their lives to interpret their definition of being stressful in their hearts. The vulgar and exaggerated performance is shocking, and it can convey a cleverly at the end. positive energy. Different from pure dog blood  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Jiangjiu Ren Fanwai
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: 2015 Chunjie Dongman Da Lianhuan
synopsis: The animation paradise inhabited by the Chinese zodiac will be in charge of Leyangyang this year. In the spirit of sharing with the world, Le Yang Yang is looking for generals to help organize the Spring Festival Gala. Unexpectedly, when he came to the animation park, he found that he had been messed up by the naughty Nian Beast. On the other hand, the general's grandfather and veteran saw Nian Beast passing by the door. Just under one chase, a group of cartoon characters shuttled through various cartoon worlds. During the process, Nian Beast knew his mistakes, and everyone did not care about the past. A group of cartoon characters realized the spirit of fairness, integrity, friendliness, harmony, civilization, care, and rule of law, and worked together to solve the difficulties and returned to the animation paradise for the New Year. (translated from tenceng(https://v.qq.com/))

title: Juedi Shi Ri
synopsis: As the star of the mine, Titan (Titan) was suddenly attacked by an alien on one day. The owner of the big mine, Ivan, immediately filed a claim with the insurance company after receiving the news. But unexpectedly, Titan was blocked by the federal government. In order to prove that the mine was destroyed, Ivan found Nora, a bounty hunter, to help him go to Titan to collect evidence. Under Ivan's huge promise, Nora took Ivan to Titan, but he did not expect that the entire Titan was empty, and only the huge Zerg was waiting for them. Nora met the old lover Tex who escaped the claws of the Zerg while hiding in the clothing store. The three wanted to find a way back to Mars while escaping from the Zerg's capture. But they didn't know that after ten days, there would be even more terrifying unknowns waiting for them. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Pao Pao Meirenyu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Minnan Yanyu Diangu
synopsis: Southern Fujian proverb is a concise, popular and philosophical formalized sentence widely circulated by the masses. This work selects 12 independent collections of allusions to be adapted into cartoons, such as the story "Don't be a horse and cow for children and grandchildren" to exhort parents who want their children to become dragons and their daughters to become phoenixes. But "Bronze Money for Paper Boots" says that the boots on one side of the buyer and seller are made of paper, and the silver dollar on the other side is made of copper. They both trade without conscience and satirize dishonest people.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhongguo Minsu Gushi
synopsis: There are many ancient and beautiful stories and legends in China. These stories are full of innocent thoughts and profound humanistic atmosphere. Therefore, they constitute one of the spiritual symbols of the Chinese nation. These stories have strengthened the Chinese people's sense of origin.  (translated from tenceng)

title: Feitian Shaonian
synopsis: In the future world, the earth's resources are depleted, environmental pollution is serious, and human survival is in crisis. The world urgently needs to train young astronauts to explore outer space and bring back new energy to save the earth. Teenagers from all over the world gathered together, in order to become real astronauts, they carried out space training such as common sense in space, physical fitness test, and weightlessness test. In the end, who will become a real astronaut, let us wait and see...  (translated from bilibili)

title: Jian Wang 3 Zhi Zhan Chun Jian
synopsis: She has no sorrow when she is young. Her heart likes to fly high. She has looked at the mountains and has a dream in the treacherous rivers and lakes. She is not afraid of hardships and bloodshed, and if she wants to inherit the world-famous Zhanchun Sword, she always leaves her children behind without touching them. It wasn't until she truly lost that precious boy that she realized that the broken part was not only a dream of the world, but also a young heart. It turns out that people you fall in love with when you are young can be remembered for a lifetime. In this world, there are two things that the master teaches people can't stop: the beauty is late, the hero is dead. Whose spring has been cut off by a spring sword?  ()translated from iqiyi

title: Jibian Ying Meng
synopsis: "Mechanism" tells a story about confrontation, against unknown environments; against tough enemies; even-against the dark side of itself. The multiverse theoretically contains an infinite set of possible universes...In a future far beyond human imagination today, the fire of life in the universe is slowly withering, and the crisis of energy depletion destroys one planet after another. In order to survive, species called mechanical lifeforms began cosmic voyages. In a long period of time, they fought each other for energy, and even split into two factions, the Light League and the Shadow League. The war continues, and the natural selection of the universe has reached its worst moment. Until one day, the Warriors of the Light Alliance got a mysterious clue, and the universe secret treasure with unlimited energy appeared! The hope of saving the universe lies on the border, in the destroyed earth! For the continuation of the future, Chi Fengyun and his comrades happily went. However, they did not know that they were not the only ones who got this clue. Darkness is spreading, and the smoke of war is slowly engulfing them... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Congming De Shunliu
synopsis: The anime TV series "Smart Shunyou" takes the dream of a strong country and a strong army as the background of the era, and uses the vivid practice of military preparations for military struggle and the fiery life of the grassroots as the basic material. It describes the new generation of soldiers such as "Shun Liu" and his comrades. In training exercises, work and life, a series of vivid and vivid stories about using tact to overcome difficulties, using coupes to help comrades, and using courage to complete tasks, through the great wisdom of young soldiers, fully demonstrate the new style and noble pursuit of contemporary young officers and soldiers. It fully demonstrates the high morale of soldiers in the new era of hard training and fighting to win, with distinctive characteristics of the times and military camps.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Congming De Shunliu season2
synopsis: The first domestic military-themed animation TV series "Smart Shunli" was jointly produced by Shenzhen Global Digital Film and Television Culture Company and the original TV Art Center of the Political Department of Jinan Military Region. The play is adapted from a popular column serialized by the former Jinan Military Region's "Qianwei Daily" since 2011. With the dream of a strong country and a strong military as the background of the times, it tells several post-90s with distinct personalities, who have different dreams and goals. , From all over the world, came to the special forces, in the training exercises and work and life, use tact to overcome difficulties, use coup tricks to help comrades, use courage to complete tasks, and finally train to become an inspirational story of top special forces.  (translated from bilibili)

details.Japanese: 聪明的顺溜 第二季

title: Caihong Baobao
synopsis: The cartoon "Rainbow Baby" tells the story of Rainbow Baby-Lulu's toy dolls were given life to childhood fantasy, and the brave and intelligent protagonist Lulu reached out to help when his friends needed help. When Lulu receives a signal for help, Lulu and her favorite toy bear, Xinbao, begin to prepare for their fantasy journey. Then Lulu's room turned into a rainbow town like magic. Lulu brought a rainbow suitcase, which was full of professional equipment that allowed her to transform into various professions (doctor, chef, firefighter, beautician, etc.) to help, and head to Rainbow Town. Lulu is always full of enthusiasm and self-confidence, and she helps friends in Rainbow Town by transforming into various professions. Friends in Rainbow Town called Lulu whenever they needed help or had a special event, and Lulu received a warm welcome. Occasionally, Rainbow Town has problems as a whole. At this time, Hululu, the mayor of Rainbow Town, will be the first to meet Lulu and tell her what happened during the period. When there is something happy and good in Rainbow Town, they will also invite Lulu to share it with Lulu. In order to solve the problem, Lulu always tries to find the cause of the problem and thinks about what role she should play to help her friends. What kind of clothes can best perform this role. After putting on clothes, Lulu has a spring of special power. She always has a positive "I can do it" attitude and works hard, successfully helping friends in Rainbow Town to solve problems in her unique way! Refreshing, strong, lively and smart Lulu is everyone's good friend.  (translated from tenceng)

title: Caihong Baobao season2
synopsis: The cartoon "Rainbow Baby" tells the story of Rainbow Baby-Lulu's toy dolls were given life to childhood fantasy, and the brave and intelligent protagonist Lulu reached out to help when his friends needed help. When Lulu receives a signal for help, Lulu and her favorite toy bear, Xinbao, begin to prepare for their fantasy journey. Then Lulu's room turned into a rainbow town like magic. Lulu brought a rainbow suitcase, which was full of professional equipment that allowed her to transform into various professions (doctor, chef, firefighter, beautician, etc.) to help, and head to Rainbow Town. Lulu is always full of enthusiasm and self-confidence, and she helps friends in Rainbow Town by transforming into various professions. Friends in Rainbow Town called Lulu whenever they needed help or had a special event, and Lulu received a warm welcome. Occasionally, Rainbow Town has problems as a whole. At this time, Hululu, the mayor of Rainbow Town, will be the first to meet Lulu and tell her what happened during the period. When there is something happy and good in Rainbow Town, they will also invite Lulu to share it with Lulu. In order to solve the problem, Lulu always tries to find the cause of the problem and thinks about what role she should play to help her friends. What kind of clothes can best perform this role. After putting on clothes, Lulu has a spring of special power. She always has a positive "I can do it" attitude and works hard, successfully helping friends in Rainbow Town to solve problems in her unique way! Refreshing, strong, lively and smart Lulu is everyone's good friend. (translated from tenceng)

title: Caihong Baobao
synopsis: Lulu and Xinbao moved into a new home! When Xinbao's love flickers, Lulu will transform into a rainbow baby and bring Xinbao to Rainbow Town! Rainbow Town in the third season has become more gorgeous, Rainbow Baby will also meet many new friends, such as the little fairy Nari, 12 cute lambs, lively rabbit babe, naughty spring brothers, and crying Giant Dino! These cute troublemakers have brought new troubles to Rainbow Town, but don't worry, Rainbow Baby always transforms into more new professions according to the situation, helping partners solve all problems! Let's set off together to start an adventure in Rainbow Town!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Caihong Baobao season3
synopsis: Lulu and Xinbao moved into a new home! When Xinbao's love flickers, Lulu will transform into a rainbow baby and bring Xinbao to Rainbow Town! Rainbow Town in the third season has become more gorgeous, Rainbow Baby will also meet many new friends, such as the little fairy Nari, 12 cute lambs, lively rabbit babe, naughty spring brothers, and crying Giant Dino! These cute troublemakers have brought new troubles to Rainbow Town, but don't worry, Rainbow Baby always transforms into more new professions according to the situation, helping partners solve all problems! Let's set off together to start an adventure in Rainbow Town!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Caihong Baobao season4
synopsis: "Rainbow Baby 4" tells the story of the six-year-old girl Lulu and Teddy Bear Xinbao miraculously coming to the fairy tale world of toys---Rainbow Town, transforming into various professional roles to help friends in the town Solve puzzles and start a story about a fantasy adventure. After receiving a signal for help, Lulu and Xinbao begin to prepare for their fantasy journey. Lulu’s room has turned into a rainbow town like magic. Lulu will also transform into a rainbow baby, open the rainbow umbrella and bring a rainbow suitcase, which is full of things that allow her to transform into various professions (doctors, Chef, firefighter, astronaut, etc.), go to Rainbow Town with Xin Bao. At this time, Hululu, the mayor of Rainbow Town, will be the first to meet Rainbow Baby and Xinbao and tell her what happened during the period. Every time Rainbow Baby will work hard to find the cause of the problem, and think about what role should be played to help friends, and what clothes to wear to better fulfill this role. After the career transformation, she will briefly introduce the career and the matching equipment, and then come up with very creative ways to help friends solve various problems. Come to Rainbow Town and start a new adventure together!  (translated from tenceng)

title: Fei Chai Hu A Ju
synopsis: The story is about the bizarre adventure of a stupid fox and his little orc friends wandering in the world, cute and handsome.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Tuteng Lingyu
synopsis: The 52nd episode of the first season of "Totem Field" is an original 3D animation with a mecha passionate adventure theme. "Totem Field" is based on the ancient Chinese totem culture system, re-deconstructs ancient beasts with cool mechas, and takes totem beliefs, totem incarnations, and totem sacred objects as the core, telling the unity of the heroes with the "totem beasts" Unanimous, an inspirational growth story of fighting for faith, fighting evil forces, and guarding the homeland of mankind.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tuteng Lingyu season2
synopsis: After successfully defeating Besara, the leader of the evil forces, Benben Jiao and his team also learned about Besara's ambition to rule the Dragon State by absorbing the power of beasts. In order to stop Besara's conspiracy, the people of Benben Jiao decided to shoulder the mission of saving another world and started the adventure of Longzhizhou. The remote and mysterious Dragon State is full of crises: The evil forces led by Besarra are invading the clan and tribes wantonly, but the "nine beasts" that originally symbolized the powerful protection of the Dragon State are falling apart and working in their own way. The Dragon State is at stake, defeating Bessara to save the Dragon State is urgent. In the dangerous expedition to Longzhizhou, Benbenjiao and his entourage met with the beasts scattered everywhere. These beasts on one side, some set an example under the inspiration of the righteous faith, and handed the symbol of faith symbolizing the mysterious power to the hand of the best team, pointing out the direction for them; some beasts were fighting for hegemony for evil. Even help the beasts to abuse... In the duel with the beasts who have gone astray, the five Benbenjiao, in the name of their beliefs, recalled the beasts who were lost and wandered among the heart demons, and not only rekindled them. After losing the long-lost pure faith, and in these challenges, the five-person totem beast has been sublimated with new power. At the same time, the "Xinyin Pavilion", an ancient organization of mysterious totem divisions hidden in the Longzhizhou, is quietly brewing its own plan. The battle to determine the fate of the Dragon State is about to start.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xing Shou Lieren
synopsis: Thousands of years ago, humans confronted the dominating evil beasts on this continent. The brave hunters gained the power of the star beast dragon king and successfully expelled the evil beasts. Since then, the star beast hunters were born, and the orcs were divided into two factions-star beasts and evil beasts. . Young Xingcheng dreams of becoming an excellent star beast hunter. After teaming up with Kaiyan beast to defeat the evil beast, he is recognized by his father, enters the Saint Hunting League to study, and becomes friends with Dongyang, Xiya, and Lanye. At this time, the Forbidden Dragon Hunting Group instigated evil beasts to attack humans, Xingcheng broke out the power of controlling the dragon to solve the crisis, but the Kaiyan beast was affected by the negative energy and out of control. In order to save the Kaiyan Beast, Xingcheng went to the sacred mountain to seek help from the Sacred Armor Dragon Group, but was attacked by the Forbidden Dragon Hunting Group. Xingcheng defeated the Forbidden Dragon Hunting Group with the power of the Red Flame Double Dragon and Kaiyan Beast. The Kaiyan beast that was out of control again left everyone and was captured by the Forbidden Dragon Hunting Group. The star became the rescuer of Kaiyan Beast and used the power to control the dragon, but he unblocked the Dark Death Dragon and put the Hunter World into crisis. Finally, Xingcheng awakens the star beast hunting god, defeats the dark dead dragon in one fell swoop, and restores world peace.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zui ke Ai De Ren
synopsis: The film was originally produced by Kaku Children and tells 7 true stories of heroes in the War of Resistance Against U.S. Aid Korea in 14 episodes. They are Zhang Kuiyin, "Avenger of Dark Night", Zhang Taofang, "A Thousand Miles Spear", "Railway Hero" Liu Enzhong, "Climbing Hero" Yang Liandi, "White Angel" Wang Qingzhen, "Iron Gallant Artillery" Liu Qingliang, and "King of Air Combat" Zhao Baotong. These seven stories are independent and interrelated, reflecting the whole picture of the war from different perspectives. The film has made a lot of effort in historical research and restoration of details. The director team collected the stories of nearly 100 heroes in one year, combined with the suggestions of a number of military experts, and selected 7 characters in the animation: "The white angel Wang Qingzhen who finds water for the wounded soldier", "Yiyi Zhang Taofang, the sniper king who killed more than 200 enemies with an old rifle without scope", "Zhang Kuiyin who reproduced the classic case of military academies in the world "surprisingly attacked Wuling Bridge"", "designed the "rail-frame floating bridge" miraculous project of climbing hero Yang Liandi "Wait for those heroes who are not well-known in the war. These are the characters and stories that really exist on the Korean battlefield. The stories of seven characters constitute the whole picture of the war from different perspectives.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Gang Jia Xiaolong Xia
synopsis: The Demon King, who was sealed by the God of Light for thousands of years, was resurrected and released a large number of demons lurking into the fairy tale world. In order to save all the fairy tale world, the God of Light dispatched zodiac warriors headed by Xiaolongxia to guard the peace of the fairy tale world. However, the super powers of the Chinese zodiac must rely on the power of the fairy tale savior to be fully utilized. Therefore, the guardian warriors headed by Xiaolongxia went to the human world to find the savior. The savior An Xiaodi, who was given a mission by the Chinese Zodiac, took the Chinese Zodiac to the fairy tales to seal demons and extinguish demons.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shengsi Huifang
synopsis: Wei, a young man with amnesia, lives by working. In an accident, there was an ability to see the memories of people before death. In the following series of events he found himself involved in a conspiracy that had already been designed. His past slowly emerged  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Zhongguo Chuantong Jieri
synopsis: It tells the legend of the origin of each traditional festival in China, and uses lively and interesting stories to let children learn about traditional Chinese festivals, know their origins, and understand traditional Chinese culture.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mu Wang Zhi Wang You Dou Zhan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Lie Che Shou Hun
synopsis: The protagonist Xingyu has just arrived in a new city. In this city, everyone is playing an online game. This online game uses the "orc man" developed by humans to compete. "Beastman" is a smart pet developed by humans. Xingyu's older brother is the one who developed these "Beastman". One day Xingyu got the Beastman Longwei from his brother's company. In this way, Xingyu took Longwei to participate in the Orcman online game competition. In this online competition, some people only lost themselves in the fun, and some found their own value and regained their confidence. In this game, I met many precious friends.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Hen Xiyou season2
synopsis: The four masters and apprentices of Tang Seng returned from the scriptures and returned to Datang. Unexpectedly, a powerful enemy of unknown origin stole the scriptures on the way. Monkey King lost his surviving son in a battle with the enemy and almost died. The whereabouts of the four masters and apprentices are unknown. In the 21st century, Fu He, an ordinary high school student, accidentally fell from a high altitude and was possessed by the soul of Monkey King. Two completely different souls were put in a piece of waste wood. How will Wukong whose life is threatened survive in this world? Where, what will happen to the waste wood who was possessed by Monkey King? What will happen to his life...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yi Xue
synopsis: The exaggerated and humorous way depicts the unexpected hilarious laughter of the heroine Lu Yixue for the first time. I used to think that the first time was beautiful and unforgettable. In the face of embarrassment, the first time was only unforgettable and sad. Lu Yixue is anxious to be wise, the dog jumps the wall anxiously, not the most embarrassed, only more embarrassing. Accidents continued one after another, and the embarrassment intensified...  (translated form iqiyi)

title: Wo Yao Hui Jia
synopsis: The main line of this work is "I want to go home": in the ancient times, there were riots and wars, and a large number of forests were invaded and burned by humans. A group of sacred beasts, led by the Fire Phoenix and Perak, were forced to live in modern society. After that, they felt that human beings were cruel to animals in every possible way. They decided to trek through mountains and rivers and travel through different dynasties to find the once free paradise. The whole film mainly presents an exquisite and infinite oriental picture scroll, with a strong "Chinese flavor" that well interprets the beautiful "Chinese dream" in the hearts of audiences of all ages.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Jiguang Xia
synopsis: The protagonist Lindsay accidentally took in the most powerful weapon in the universe-the lightning cat. In order to win the Lightning Cat, all forces are ready to move, and the ten most powerful evil forces in the universe, the top ten demon groups, take turns in battle, using all kinds of force and means to continuously create crises and chaos in the city. But in desperation, Lindsay Le accidentally acquired Aurora superpowers, and met Master Nolan, Murong Sovereign, and Jin Yanna. Under the leadership of Master Nolan, several people formed the Aurora Man team, working together to resolve the crisis and troubles in the city, and to protect the homes of the city and the people here.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Qi Ji Leyuan
synopsis: In the vast nature, there is a city made of building blocks (Qiji Paradise). In this city, the conscious building block life form (odd building block) and the little humans live together. Odd building blocks have "odd power", they can freely combine to form many things, from small props to large buildings, on the contrary, very weak little human races have agile minds. These two races help each other and live happily in Qiji Paradise every day. In Qiji Paradise, there is a yellow private car, Harpy, who is smart and likes thinking and has a very sunny personality. He has many good friends. Among them, he is particularly good with the sports car race, the propeller plane Kiki, and the off-road vehicle Jeep. They explore the town every day. Whenever they encounter something that bothers everyone Use your brains, you can always use extraordinary power to solve problems in unexpected ways. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Die Di Baobei Zhi Shenqi Ha Ku
synopsis: Koala father, who was busy all day, had to face a sweet and difficult problem in his life, how to accompany his baby and how to become the most competent all-round dad. Depressed, he finally got a response from heaven. A magical Haku, who is always full of passion and often comes up with weird ideas, became Koala's father's parenting assistant. This, this is really a "bad" start. From then on, everything has become thrilling, crazy and out of control. However, in order for the baby to become a brave explorer, in order for the baby to see the wider world, the koala father must muster up the courage to travel around with the baby and the magic haku. Hot deserts, deep jungles, majestic mountains, boundless grasslands... even the distant dinosaur era left their crazy footprints. They have gone through storms and hardships, and they have to watch out for the penguin father who is plotting bad things, but nothing is more important than the happiness of the baby(translated from iqiyi)

title: Qi Ku Baobei Jihua Zhi Da Ai Wujiang
synopsis: The film is the first domestic animation on earthquake-resistant themes. The film tells the story of Little Koala Qiku, Gorilla Doudou, Xiaolong Jiakai, Tanuki Mingmei and Penguin Lanpin riding in an airship on the way to celebrate the birthday of teacher Afei the puppy. Suddenly encountered a major earthquake. In the earthquake, the children were in danger and set up a "Qiku Rescue Team" to rescue the animals in the forest and found the missing teacher Afei. Qiku and others Solidarity Association  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 奇酷宝贝计划之大爱无疆

title: Huoxian Zhan Jing
synopsis: Se Na, who lost her parents in a fire, and her grandfather founded a firefighting unit called the "Line of Fire". In addition to Se Na and grandfather, there are captain Tae Wu and the son of a firefighter, a young and passionate member of the team. The heroes of the "Lines of Fire" were able to transform their invincible tanks into fire suits, thus saving many lives. Let us join them in their adventure to protect the residents of the metropolis!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ha Lou Pu Xingren
synopsis: Alien Tata (link) brought the pet little Q (link) and high technology beyond the millennia of human science and technology to the earth. I thought that there would be no disadvantages, but in an accident, the spacecraft was scrapped and had to rely on the earth boy Hou Ye. Hou Ye’s ordinary summer vacation was completely overturned. The alien roommate who broke in by accident caused him all kinds of unexpected troubles, and at the same time let Hou Ye see a magical technology that he had never imagined: from far away light years away. The Portuguese civilization, the ever-changing mysterious explorer, this alien friend full of secrets. All brought earth-shaking changes to Hou Ye's life... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ha Lou! Pu Xingren Zhi Ji Xun Tegong
synopsis: At the end of the first season, Hou Ye, Tata, Qiu Shasha, and Zhu Zhimo received an acceptance letter from the organization unexpectedly, and each became a member of the New Secret Service Training Bureau. The story of this season will create a mysterious and magical "Extraterrestrial Affairs Administration" (BEA) for children, such a huge institution with a long history and set up to protect the earth. Hou Ye and other children were chosen by this mysterious organization and became small intern agents, and they saw all kinds of screaming existences. Following the experience of the protagonist, Hou Ye, the children experienced the troubles and joys of growing up, and understood what kind of responsibility they need to be called true growth, and the sense of responsibility that follows.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 哈喽！葡星人之极训特工

title: Bao Ji Qiangshou
synopsis: Remember the flash bomb thrown by the pig teammates? ! Male Hiromaru will land in the new world of competitive games and embark on a journey to the top of the world tower. The journey is long and there are many levels. Each mob and the boss have their own advantages. It will be a long time to see the encounter and clash of different gunfight worlds. Teaming up to fight shooting, does it remind you of the youthful years of youth?  (translated from bilibili)

title: Bao Ji Qiangshou Zhi AK Xiyou
synopsis: What new tricks did Buddha angle Baba have made? ! Why O Hiromaru was crushed for five hundred years! Is it a human tragedy or a world disorder! What kind of adventure will happen in a brand new world! AK Westward Journey ~ Fun on Earth!  (translated from bilibili)

title: Bao Ji Qiangshou Zhi t De Richang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Nengli Youxian Gongsi
synopsis: After the earthquake, the protagonist Huomaren possessed the "superpowers that can pull people apart as long as they say compliments and pleasant words." He found that he had superpowers and joined a company called e-energy expatriates with great volition to become a hero, but discovered that this company is actually using superpowers to help people solve trivial matters in life, and has received countless photos. After the e-level task of "solving constipation", hemp ren also lost confidence in his work. At this time, his boss suddenly sent a downgraded person with A-level ability to partner with him, but he was confused because of this. Finally received the first B-level mission.  (translated from qq)

title: Qiang Ling Jihua
synopsis: The story world contains the mysterious and ancient spear spirit emblem. The spear spirit emblem has a powerful force. It will drop the spear spirit emblem at any time and place, becoming the focus of the struggle between justice and evil. The legendary spear spirit named King's Heart has been sleeping for a long time, just waiting for someone who can wake him up.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Jouran: The Princess of Snow and Blood
synopsis: Set in alternate history Japan in 1931 and the 64th year of the Meiji era, the Tokugawa shogunate was never abolished and Emperor Meiji was never restored to power. The anime will follow the activities of "Nue," an organization of shogunate executioners who enforce the government. The country has developed its own energy source, the "dragon vein," and has achieved a unique development in which science and the Edo period are mixed. However, behind the glamorous city, the dissident organization Kuchinawa strives to overthrow the administration, while the Nue of the Tokugawa regime, who was entrusted with its extermination, are in conflict. Sawa Yukimura, whose family was killed when she was young, continues to search for Janome, the executioner of the Nue. (Source: MAL News)

details.English: Joran The Princess of Snow and Blood
details.Japanese: 擾乱 THE PRINCESS OF SNOW AND BLOOD

title: Maoshan Xiao Daoshi
synopsis: Through the wonderful story of the virtual little Taoist "Mao Xiaosheng" who apprentices to learn art and travel down the mountain, in the coordinates of Chinese culture, it creates an image of a witty, intelligent, naughty and cute little Taoist who is superb.  (tanslated from iqiyi)

title: Boku wa boku o sukininaru
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Hentai!
synopsis: Hentai! is a doujin anime made in MikuMikuDance (MMD). It follows the conversations of four teenage girls, Hasekura Akane, Yuzumochi Kurumi, Aizome Jun, and Sasanoha Midori, as they discuss perverted topics and learn about their own sexuality.  Taken from Kawaiifu.com

title: Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid
synopsis: Cursed by a witch as a child, a young duke gained the unwanted power to kill every living thing he touches. Forced to move away from his family and into a large mansion deep in the woods, the duke is treated as if he does not exist and is continually shunned by his peers. However, he is not entirely alone. Rob and Alice, his butler and maid, are always by his side. Alice loves to tease him, and as their relationship grows, the duke makes it his goal to break free from his deadly curse. Of course, he is going to need some help, and who better to do this than the various inhabitants of the supernatural?

details.English: The Duke of Death and His Maid
details.Synonyms: Young Master the Grim Reaper and the Black Maid
details.Japanese: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

title: Mengxiang Zhaohuan Wang
synopsis: The cartoon is about the elementary school student "Siri" in Rainbow City who accidentally enters the world of his game "Summoner of Dreams" and gets acquainted with the Dragon Warrior. With the development of the story, the real world and the dream world are gradually overlapping. The two worlds will suffer a huge crisis. Only by gathering the Five Soul Fighters can everything be saved. So, Sirui and his friends stepped into the dream world together. After experiencing various adventures, everyone gradually became mature and found their own summoning throne, signed a soul contract with the hero, and became a five-soul fighter. In the end, the demon king of the dream world invaded the real world, and Sirui took the five soul fighters against the demon king, defeated the demon king under the strength of unity, and saved the entire world.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Mengxiang Zhaohuan Wang season2: Caihong
synopsis: This work is about Sirui, Xiaoyao, Lin Xiaoke, Incheon, and Xue Jiu who were originally going to attend Lin Xiaoke's concert, but inspired by the goddess of photon, he once again came to the continent of dreams. The Dream Continent, which was originally quiet and peaceful and full of fairy tales, is now in crisis again, and the time magician has come back to conquer the entire Dream Continent. In order to destroy the dream kingdom, the time magician used magic to set up a time rift. Countless beasts gushed out from the shadow rift and destroyed everywhere. With the unremitting efforts of the Heavenly Sword Judgment Army and the Five Soul Fighters, everyone temporarily prevented the outflow. The further destruction of the Kingdom of Dreams by the World of Warcraft. In the face of difficulties, everyone felt that they could not sit still. In order to save the dream kingdom and the dream continent, the five soul fighters headed by Sirui were ordered to find the seven dreams in the dream continent. The purpose of the journey was to find The guardians of the dream in the dream, and gain their power. Only by gaining the power representing the seven elements of the Dream Continent, can the Gaia Scepter be repaired, and then the time rift can be closed and the crisis of the Dream Kingdom can be lifted. For the entire Dream Continent, Sirui and others must undertake this adventure. After a brief farewell to the King of the Kingdom of Dreams and the Dean of the Heavenly Sword Academy Spencer, everyone embarked on the journey. The dean's grandson, the little troublemaker Xingchen, also mixed into the team, and followed everyone on the adventure. The journey is full of hardships, in order to gather the power of the seven-fold dream and fight the time magician, everyone is not afraid of dangers and obstacles, and goes forward bravely. Through various clues, Sirui and others found candy dreams, order dreams, scorching dreams, reflection dreams, fairy tale dreams, power dreams, and hope dreams one by one. In the end, the five souls collected the power of the seven-fold dream and defeated the time magician. Dream of the mainland returning to peace again. This work is positive, entertaining and entertaining. The story not only constructs a magnificent dream continent, which makes people immersive, but also conveys positive energy in the story adventure, so that the audience can watch the film. Understand kindness and bravery, unity and friendship, help each other, as well as wisdom and perseverance in the face of difficulties.  (translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 梦想召唤王第二季:彩虹

title: Mi Le Mi Ke Zhi Shenqi Haitun Dao
synopsis: Dolphin Island is a beautiful and mysterious island in the sea. There are long and winding coastlines, deep dense forests, snow-capped mountains, and prosperous towns. The people here are harmonious, friendly and lead a peaceful life. It is said that Dolphin Island has a unique and wonderful space. Children have the most pure and beautiful hearts in the world. They can discover magical things and elves that adults cannot find. Miller, Mike and their parents are a happy family of four. This summer, they moved to Dolphin Island. In the eyes of Mi Le and Mi Ke, wonderful things happen on Dolphin Island every day... "Mi Le Mi Ke: The Magical Dolphin Island" is based on "man and self", "man and man", "man and society". "People and the environment", the four major connotations as the main axis of the story, through the wonderful story to let children know the attitude that life should have, and let the children feel after watching the animation: self-esteem, confidence, acceptance, courage, respect, Caring, cooperation, honesty, appreciation, material resource, resilience, vision, endurance, perseverance and other high-quality vitality.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 米乐米可之神奇海豚岛

title: Dan Dan Xiaozi
synopsis: On July 7, 2018, in order to retrieve the mysterious substance on the planet Dandan, the Orega substance, the Dandan starmen forced a landing on the earth after chasing the steel. Due to the carelessness of the villain's steel, the Orega substance has penetrated into the earth's coins and scattered everywhere. In order to retrieve Oregal's material, the Dandan Stars are in a situation where they must fight alone. At this time, as long as the coins infiltrated with Origa's substance are put into the vending machine, various monsters such as can monsters and snack monsters will pop out of them. Under the orders of the bluffing universe villain Gang Jun, the silly monsters find fault with the Dandan star in everything and prevent them from completing their mission. To make matters worse, they were mistaken for toys by children on the earth, threatening to be kidnapped. Finally, I had a fateful meeting with the earth boy Xiao Ming... These little aliens actually took the huge earth boy Xiao Ming as a prisoner and called them at will. Despite this, the kind-hearted Xiao Ming still provides a house for the poor super-mini alien...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: One Piece x Nissin Cup Noodles
synopsis: one piece with noodles

details.English: One Piece x Nissin Cup Noodles
details.Japanese: One Piece x Nissin Cup Noodles

title: Wo De Maoxian Shijie

title: Wo De Maoxian Shijie season2
synopsis: In the new season, the protagonist and his party will use the search for their sister as a guide to the perilous lower realm, and start a new adventure with the main purpose of "returning to the real world". The villain with Cthulhu-Heim as the spiritual support seeks the most suitable host among the protagonists to achieve Heim's unknown evil purpose, and constantly creates various troubles for the protagonist team. In the end, the protagonists defeated the withered shadow skeleton that Hem gave the evil power, successfully rescued the patron saint of the lower realm and opened the door to crossing. (translated from baidu)

details.Japanese: 我的冒险世界 第二季

title: Wo De Maoxian Shijie season2 special

title: Cao Jingling
synopsis: Grass elves are the guardians of grass seeds, maintaining ecological balance. Voles are enemies of the grass elves. They steal food and hoard grass seeds. The grass elves' grandfather Sahus is an elven elder who knows the secrets of the grassland; Doria the grass elves are smart and cute, and she can’t understand the stealing behavior of voles. , So beware of voles to grab grass seeds on the grassland; the grass wizard Xinjile is Doria’s younger brother, and he is constantly developing excellent grass seeds. The cunning voles tried all kinds of tricks to steal grass seeds. In order to protect the grass seeds, the grass elves constantly fight against the field mice, and the struggle between them has never stopped.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: He Nu Er De Richang
synopsis: The work uses Chen Yuanfeng as his father to record the growth of his daughter Lanlan. A loving father is often tossed by his daughter in daily pain, but he will still treat all the troubles caused by the child with a warm heart. At the same time, Dad also took his daughter to do many stupid things that seem stupid but are full of life philosophy.  (translated from bilibili)

title: He Nu Er De Richang season2
synopsis: The work uses Chen Yuanfeng as his father to record the growth of his daughter Lanlan. A loving father is often tossed by his daughter in daily pain, but he will still treat all the troubles caused by the child with a warm heart. At the same time, Dad also took his daughter to do many stupid things that seem stupid but are full of life philosophy.  (translated from bilibili)

title: He nu Er De Richang season3
synopsis: A warm and loving dad often suffers from the pain of his daughter in daily life, but the dad often treats all the troubles caused by the child with a warm heart.  (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 和女儿的日常 第三季

title: Qiao Shou Luban
synopsis: Luban is a symbol and symbol of Chinese folk wisdom. In this film, this cultural symbol gets a new interpretation-Little Luban, a 6-year-old boy with a magical tool bag, smart, capable, and good at hands-on. He and his friends explore new worlds and overcome difficulties together , Actively use hands and brains, and experience growth together. The story takes place in a beautiful place called Xingfu Village. After being hit by a once-in-a-hundred-year flood, Xiao Luban and his robot Pi Xiu, good friend Xiangxiang, Rainbow Brothers, and Little Wild Boar Roar, in order to protect the happy village, Collect happy flowers and pistachios together. After passing through the levels of the Rainbow Tower, finally overcoming numerous difficulties and helping Xiangxiang find her four brothers (the lotus elves guarding the Happy Village). (translated from tenceng)

title: Qiao Shou Luban Zhi Zhihui Bao He
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Mai Kuai Sanguo

title: Sanguo Yanyi(2016)

title: Guaishou Chufang
synopsis: This film takes cute little monsters as the protagonist and a modern smart kitchen as the background. Show the fashionable and beautiful food by telling the fun and interesting stories between the little monsters and various ingredients  (translated from youku)

title: Huang Ba Tianxia
synopsis: If the new prince wants to inherit the throne, he must be tested in the mysterious black forest. In the forest, the prince got acquainted with many new partners by accident. He was sometimes hilarious, sometimes thrilling, funny and warm along the way. Everyone played their strengths in the danger and experienced countless hardships together. (translated from youku)

title: Huanle Beijixing
synopsis: There is a sacred place for martial arts with a long history in the extreme cold of the north. People there adhere to traditional culture and traditional martial arts, insist on improving their own cultivation by diligent study and practice, respect nature, respect life, and inherit it in the arms of previous leaders And guarding a thousand-year gem-the star of the North Pole. The world's largest biotechnology group-Kuanghai Group's Nan is not difficult for many years firmly believe that the Arctic Star is the key to eternal youth, vowing to seize this gem to develop biological agents that violate the laws of nature. As a result, the friends on the top of the Arctic competed with the Kuanghai Group, a rival with completely different value orientations. Traditional culture and modern technology continued to collide, influence and merge with each other. This is how a relaxed, humorous and intriguing protection war was drawn. Kicked off.  (translated from douban)

title: Duanzi Gou Riji
synopsis: The episode of sprinkling materials is finished, and the collection of soaking noodles is finished... Although the size is short, the old driver has not short driving experience, and the good sections continue. (translated from bilibili)

title: Zheng Yi Men
synopsis: The animation "Zheng Yimen" takes the story of the parent Zheng Lian as the main line, and the family rules as the core element. 15 vivid stories systematically show the major activities of the Zheng family and the main content of the Zheng family rules. How does the Code integrate the systems of ethics, behavioral standards, production management, life learning and other systems and rewards and punishments, and how to become the most practical family management norm in history. At the same time, it also shows the positive influence of "filial piety, righteousness, and integrity" on self-cultivation, family management, and state management, which deeply reflects the significance of the times of family style and rules, and subtly promotes traditional Chinese culture.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Xifan Yuyan
synopsis: The Chinese classic fables interpreted in the image of the porridge animation series allow children to learn knowledge from the fables and watch animations to have a three-pointed future.  (translated form iqiyi)

title: Xifan Shi Wan Ge Weisheme
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Lao Ba Te Fannao
synopsis: Organize a big alliance of daddy, determined to be a heart-warming dad!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Chun Ya Baobei
synopsis: Chunya Baby is directed by He Wenqiang, written by Peng Hui, and is a popular science cartoon on children's dental health produced by Shenzhen Chunya Health Service Technology Co., Ltd. In the Peach Blossom Valley, a group of animal friends grow up carefree here. One day, the friends came to the Chunya Clinic in Peach Blossom Valley by accident, got to know Chunya Baby, who has magical superpowers, and accidentally learned about the evil conspiracy of Toothless Devil who wants to harm the dental health of animal residents. The animal partners decided to help Chunya Baby and protect the dental health of the animal residents in Peach Blossom Valley.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Sen Ba Xingfu Dao
synopsis: In some corner of the sea, there is a magical island-Happy Island [1]. A group of cute animals live on the island, among them is a brave little lion-Samba. The little animals like him very much, because he is not only brave, confident, and enthusiastic, but also often bursts out unconstrained ideas, often taking his partners on adventures. Samba always has a stinky little rabbit by his side-Xiao Shuai, who takes out the mirror at any time, often reveling in his handsome appearance. Xiaoshuai's neighbor is a weird owl-big head, big head always makes all kinds of novel and fun inventions, and friends like it very much. Among the little friends, there is also a pair of lovely siblings, quiet and strong. Jingjing is a lady's little panda and the little goddess of animals. She loves beauty, laughs, and cry. Sometimes her friends can't stand her crying. Zhuang Zhuang is a hippo that loves to eat, and a good assistant to animals. When a partner needs help, he will silently help everyone. Of course, in addition to these cute animals, there is also a respected grandfather-Sen Ge. Seng is an old and stable sea lion, and a good elder of animals. This group of cute animals will regularly go to Seng's house to listen to stories, will go on adventures under Samba's leadership, will find magical plants, will follow the big heads to play new things... They live a fulfilling life on the island of happiness. happy life. However, a strange pair of father and son-Ou Ye and son Ono, who claim to be navigators, have been searching for the uninhabited island called Xingfu Island in the legend [2]. After repeated failed searches, an island was discovered after experiencing the most dangerous storm at sea. Finally, after hard work, the father and son boarded the island on a broken ship. The father and son of the rest of their lives were ecstatic when they learned that this was the legendary Happiness Island and determined to stay and live. However, the intrusion of a new neighbor broke the peace of Xingfu Island. Reluctant to become neighbors, they started a fun life.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Si Lu Gongzhu
synopsis: Uyghur girl Ayiguli encounters the thousand-year sycamore tree god and gets the magical mutton fat jade, becoming the silk road princess guarding the Silk Road. With the help of the four little beasts: King Paixiu, Tuwei, Qiongqi, and Dijiang, she helped countless kind people in different time and space on the Silk Road, and defeated a series of go astray on the Silk Road. The fierce god who robbed the past merchants. Those who have received the help of Princess Silk Road will get a piece of mutton fat jade. If they are in distress, they only need to hold the mutton fat jade in their hands and read the name "Princess Silk Road" silently, and the Princess Silk Road will appear to help them solve their problems. For thousands of years, Princess Silk Road has guarded this main channel of economic, political and cultural exchanges between the East and the West forever.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Weilai Xifu Bendi Lang
synopsis: "Foreign Daughter-in-law and Local Lang" takes the family life of a family named Kang in the old city of Xiguan in Guangzhou as the background, and uses the contradictions and collisions between the old couple, four sons and four "foreign daughter-in-laws" as the main line of the story. Easy, humorous and witty storyline. The short play shows the audience a life full of fresh content and comedic colors, the conflict between Lingnan culture and northern culture, and an in-depth discussion on the various aspects of life in modern social life and a series of hot topics in society.  (translated from baidu)

title: Tiancai Lianmeng
synopsis: The League of Geniuses is a team composed of five elementary school students: Zhu Xiaocai, Li Congcong, Qian Duoduo, Lu Dazhu, and Fan Tongtong. In order to have the VIP of the game of genius hegemony, Zhu Xiaocai broadcasted the coordinates of the earth to the universe, and the earth was invaded by aliens. Zhu Xiaocai and the others were kidnapped by aliens. In distress, they played games to restore peace to the earth. At this time, the big boss of the genius hegemony game approached Zhu Xiaocai, hoping that they would represent the earth in the genius hegemony universe league. What's the conspiracy in this...  (translated from bilibili)

title: Hu Duoduo
synopsis: The love story of two lovely tigers is also a story for everyone who believes in love and is persistent in giving. The story can be understood as a certain date between the two protagonists, a certain marriage proposal, a certain confession... But the results are all self-defeating and laughing. In the play, warm, romantic, touching, humorous, funny and other sentiments will naturally show up, which makes people feel a lot of emotion. (translated from bilibili)

title: Dagui Jiang
synopsis: The story takes place in a small city. The protagonist Jiang Boyan goes home after graduation to help his mother take care of the city express store. Because of a strange package, a strange journey started, involving people, ghosts, Taoism, and grievances that spanned thousands of years...  (translated from qq)

title: Cheng Chang Bu Fannao
synopsis: It tells about the happy life of the Judy and Zhu Lai family of four: Dad prepared roses to give to mother, mother changed clothes at home, and prepared to take her son out together. However, my mother didn't know that her son had painted on her skirt, and he had a high rate of turning his head on the street.  (translated from baidu)

title: Wanmei Shijie Shuang Shi Ji
synopsis: The story is set in an environment of Xianxia, and the overall world view is an overhead world. The families in this world judge their status with food. As the head of the four major families, the Shi family is fighting fiercely, and Shi Hao’s cousins regard it as "the supreme bone soup". "Bao" was taken away by shameless means, and his family disappeared. Shi Hao was raised incognito under the protection of the housekeeper's grandfather. After he grew up, he was sent to the Xinxinxin Perfect Kitchen by the housekeeper's grandfather, where a group of students studied to become the perfect chef. Struggle, each episode staged a farce on the theme of cooking the most delicious, peerless dishes.  (translated from youku)

title: Piaoyi Dao Zhi Tiankong Lixian Ji
synopsis: "Drift Island Sky Adventure" tells the story of Tongtong and Bingbing brothers selected by the Emerald Stone of Sky Island and enter the fantasy sky island adventure, meeting scary stone monsters, running tree monsters, and big ears of quirky spirits The rabbit, as well as the characters such as Big Bad Wolf and Big Stupid Bear, are as wonderful as Alice in Wonderland. Each episode contains a small educational theme, such as honesty, courage, diligence and thrift, which is entertaining and entertaining. There is also a funny character Jin Gulu in the film, he is the descendant of Monkey King. This animation took more than three years to complete, and each episode contains a small educational theme, such as integrity, bravery, diligence, etc., which is entertaining and entertaining.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Huan Yue Da Lianmeng
synopsis: A group of extraterrestrial visitors call themselves the "Happy Alliance", among them is a lightning deer with the superpower of "getting things from the air" and a powerful lightning rat. Relying on their optimistic character, they quickly became one with the aborigines. The Thunderbolt Rat was resourceful and the Lightning Deer impulsive and reckless. The two of them had very different personalities, and they could quarrel about everything. Nevertheless, they have found common ground in being helpful. Although they will not help out in all likelihood, they persevere in order to bring joy to those around them.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: He Xiaolu Wen Wen Yiqi Wan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jiayou Ba! San Er Ban
synopsis: Come on! Class 3 and 2 is created from the perspective of children. The protagonist is all the teachers and students of Class 3 and 2 who integrate the "Eight Etiquette and Four Etiquette" training education into their daily learning and life. The cartoon has 10 episodes, each 15 minutes,  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Jiayou Ba! San Er Ban season2
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 加油吧！三二班 第二季

title: Dou Dao
synopsis: "Take Island" mainly tells what happens when a pair of opposite sex is dating on an uninhabited island. There are 22 characters in the animation that represent different professions and unique personalities. Each personality can collide with different sparks. It may be angry, or it may be a good memory that will make people smile. All kinds of situations are good and bad, but they are all things that happen around you, and because these things happen on this island, it is also named "Comic Island"  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Yi Qilai Kan Liuxingyu
synopsis: Chu Yuxun is a girl with a tough personality and lofty ideals. Although the family conditions are not good, she has always lived a positive and optimistic life. Through her own hard work, she was admitted to the top university of her dreams-Alliston College. When she entered the ideal university, her worries continued to come. The four students in the school who like to be extravagant, compare each other, and bully others made Chu Yuxun's brains very troubled, but she always insisted on helping others and persevering. Finally, four This classmate was finally moved by Chu Yuxun's strong independence. They appreciated each other in the contest and competition and became friends in life, and together they became the top five outstanding students in the school. (translated form youku)

title: Zhongguo Qiao Guniang Zhi Huangdao Po
synopsis: It tells the story of Songjiang weaver Huang Qiao'er obsessed with weaving and encounters cotton Li brocade, so she has repeatedly given up a rich and comfortable life, boarded a cargo ship going south, and went to Yazhou to learn Li brocade skills, and spread the cotton textile skills more selflessly to make the common people popular Can afford to wear beautiful warm clothes. This cartoon adapted from the story of Huang Daopo, a famous textile expert in the Southern Song Dynasty of China, tells the legendary experience of women who have the courage to innovate and benefit the world with a delicate technique and a unique perspective.  (translated form iqiyi)
